// This file consist the needed function which are common for both Input Field and Output Field
export const TxtField=(idx,setTxtArea1,setTxtArea2,setBtnColor1,setBtnColor2)=>{if(idx===1){setTxtArea1(true);setTxtArea2(false);setBtnColor1("blue");setBtnColor2("white");}else{setTxtArea1(false);setTxtArea2(true);setBtnColor1("white");setBtnColor2("blue");}};
